name: Invertebrate Tycoon
description:
Invertebrate Tycoon 1.0

A quick and rather silly prototype by @JCVSMC

Based on fictional video game idea 375 by @FrogCroakley (Original tweet here)

Drag 2 Beetles to the mug to breed them.

Drag a Beetle to the money bag to sell it.

50 DIFFERENT BEETLES TO DISCOVER.
